How to build this blog?

I used an 11ty base blog as a start template. You can find it here.
Please, follow the steps in README.md to create a blog.

I used GitHub Pages to publish my blog. A link to a blog repository.

You need to deploy your blog to the GitHub Pages repository to publish it.

You can find previous versions of this blog here

Hope this was helpful.
Feel free to write to me.
